TextBlock.Text: GUANDALE: Mission complete. Final coordinate found.
BOBER: ...why do I always get paired up with the weird people?
GUANDALE: Substantiate: Nomai-like text on ground.
GUANDALE: Translating: "Ha! I knew you guys wouldn't want to venture to the other Lean variants!"
GUANDALE: Translating: "Heheh... but we're long gone. Or are we? We honestly don't know."
BOBER: Guandale, stop talking like an NPC! Your monotone voice is getting on my nerves!
GUANDALE: Translating: "If possible, come visit us. If you can. But please, go visit the coordinates we've given you! It's... important for our safety. Sincerly, *garble*."
